title: Necropolis of Light
description: For innocent bystanders, Adele and Gerard, what starts as a routine ride on the Paris Métro spirals into a nightmare in an all-out war between Jill Lever and her inhuman enemies. As the underbelly of Paris collapses into bloody chaos the pair must fight to reach the surface, the odds stacking against them every step of the way.Only one man can save Paris from ruination. One man who can put an end to the atrocities unfolding beneath the city’s streets. For Seline Sterling he’s at once an only hope and a desperate gamble—is Tommy Coyle reformed, or is he just a time bomb waiting to explode?Two couples. One city. And the stakes have never been higher. Welcome to the Necropolis of Light.
author: S.M. Stelmack
